@Dan_Balsdon Hi Dan, we wouldn't advise hanging wallpaper in a place that's exposed to the elements. However, if you're looking to...
@Dan_Balsdon ...customise your shed (inside & out) we've got a great range of exterior paints. We've got anything from sophisticated...
@Dan_Balsdon ...neutrals to bright fashion colours. We'd love to see a photo when you're done!
@real_rob_coates Hi Robert, we recommend using sugar soap solution. This removes greasy deposits & dirt so should work on old paste.
@carolinetighe75 Hi Caroline, the easiest way is to use "paste the wall" wallpaper. They don't need to be soaked, you apply the paste...
@carolinetighe75 ...directly to the wall & apply the paper, then simply trim the ends. It also removes in one strip.
@carolinetighe75 Here's a video that shows you exactly how to do it: http://t.co/3MGYA8OE4g Let us know how you get on! Good luck :)
